Blot: Blot is by cave, guarding cave, cave guard Blot, yeah...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Scourge/Hun-Grr/Ramjet:::
> 
> ::He follows Megatron::
> ~~~~~
> Hun-Grr: Blot? Hun-Grr not know.
> ::Opens his comm to Blot::
> Hun-Grr: Blot, where you?  Come here now.
> ~~~~~
> Ramjet: I would like a full alliance, in which we help each other 
whenever 
> need be.  We need this Alliance because we are the last of the 
Destrons.  The 
> eight of us are all that is left.  Alone we will not be able to 
thrive as a 
> faction, so we need alignments.  We chose your group because you 
are a large 
> and powerful faction, and i know of how you grew from a small group 
of 
> breakaway predacons to the great power you are now.  This has 
inspired me. If 
> i want someone helping me and my team out on the battlefield, id 
like someone 
> reliable like yourselves.
